name: Double Colorless Energy
text: Provides 2 Colorless Energy. Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.

effect.text: Provides 2 Colorless energy. Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.

weaknesses: Not a basic Energy - can't be searched by some effects
synergies: Wigglytuff Do the Wave - Fast setup
counters: Energy Removal discards both energy at once

competitiveHistory: Double Colorless Energy was essential for many aggressive decks, particularly Wigglytuff which could use Do the Wave faster with DCE.

rulings.ruling: DCE provides 2 Colorless Energy but counts as 1 card.
DCE is not a basic Energy and cannot be searched by Energy Retrieval.
If DCE is discarded for an attack cost that requires 2 Energy, the whole card is discarded.
